title: Pbe/Bp and Rp
body: I can't seem to get the insane amount of Rp and Bp :/

replies.body: Typically those stipends get added sometime around 11am each day, but some people need to make sure they've played at least one game on the account before it shows up. Have you seen that stipend yet? Let me know the PBE summoner name and I can take a look if not.
